Docs.typeparam: The type of the input passed to the generator.
The type of the embedding instance produced by the generator.
Docs.param: The delegate to invoke to configure the instance. It is passed a clone of the caller-supplied instance (or a new constructed instance if the caller-supplied instance is ).
Docs.summary: Adds a callback that configures a to be passed to the next client in the pipeline.
Docs.remarks: This can be used to set default options. The delegate is passed either a new instance of if the caller didn't supply a instance, or a clone (via of the caller-supplied instance if one was supplied.
